name: TCGplayer Pro Retail
description:
Available Exclusively for Pro Sellers - If you’re part of TCGplayer Pro, you can enjoy easy order management wherever you are.

Process In-Store Orders Faster - With an intuitive interface that’s easy to navigate and no online orders to sift through, you can instantly see new in-store pickup orders from your kiosk and website.

Sync with Seller Portal - Move orders from Received to Pulling to Ready for Pickup to Picked Up. The order status will update in your Seller Portal so all employees are on the same page.

Manage Orders Anywhere - Enjoy the freedom to see orders from anywhere in your store or on the go instead of being stuck behind your counter.

See Order Details - View the customer name, order number, product price, order total, quantity and current status for both pending and fulfilled orders.

Accessible to Your Entire Team - Log in using your Pro account, or give employees access with your custom user roles.

Transactions Are Coming - In the future, you’ll be able to process credit card transactions directly through the app.
